name: io.github.croit/mcp-croit-ceph
description: MCP server for Croit Ceph cluster management with dynamic OpenAPI tool generation

environmentVariables.name: CROIT_API_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: API authentication token for Croit cluster

environmentVariables.name: OPENAPI_FILE
environmentVariables.description: Path to local OpenAPI spec file (optional, overrides server fetch)

environmentVariables.name: LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging verbosity: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR (default: INFO)
